name: AP_CLM_VST_RSN_DX
description: This table stores the diagnoses that formed the reason for the patient's visit.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VST_RSN_DX_ID
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis codes that were the patient's reason for visit
